title: miCoach SMART RUN

asset.author: adidas
asset.hookText:
Powered by miCoach.com, SMART RUN is an all-in-one sports watch that delivers real-time coaching. With a strapless heart rate monitor, GPS tracking and colour touchscreen, the single button interface delivers your essential statistics so you can take your workout to a whole new level.

The device merges all you need for your perfect run into one, single device. The miCoach SMART RUN tracks via a revolutionary new technology for highly accurate heart rate signals direct from your wrist - no need for chest-based heart rate monitors. 

Further, the built-in GPS sensor within miCoach SMART RUN delivers additional running relevant metrics to track all movement and position related information, giving you all you need, when you need it. 

Join the conversation: #smartrun
Buy miCoach SMART RUN : http://www.adidas.com/smartrun
Get started: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S6aNlC1ifR0
